Lemon Tahini Dressing


Ingredients
½ lemon, juiced
3 tablespoons tahini paste
2 tablespoons olive oil
2 tablespoons water
1 clove garlic, roughly chopped
½ teaspoon salt
¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

Cooking Instructions

Combine lemon juice, tahini, olive oil, water, garlic, salt,
and pepper in a mini food processor or blender; process
until smooth.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/lemon-tahini-dressing-recipe-8647026 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Lemon Tahini Dressing
